item.description: Sanitizing and manipulating labeled blood-brain barrier permeable molecules.

item.title: Scaffold splitting and model training using chemprop
item.description: Chemically aware data splitting using scaffold splitting. Data is then trained using a directed message passing neural network (D-MPNN).

item.description: Implementing restriction digestion using regular expressions, lists, and dictionaries.
